name: Alex Morgan
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Full-stack engineer with 6+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Passionate about clean architecture, performance optimization, and developer experience. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams to deliver user-centric products.

highlights: Architected and launched a design system used by 15+ product teams, reducing UI inconsistencies by 70%
Migrated legacy React codebase to TypeScript, improving type safety and reducing runtime errors by 45%
Led performance initiative that improved Lighthouse scores from 55 → 92 across all core products
Built real-time analytics dashboard using React, Redux, and WebSockets serving 10k+ daily users
Implemented CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time from 20min → 4min
Collaborated with UX researchers to conduct usability tests and iterate on key user flows
